VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Lumina Solutions relative to Verdant Ventures?
SRP.A: Lumina Solutions is {below} Verdant Ventures in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Verdant Ventures relative to Skyward Systems?
SRP.A: Verdant Ventures is {above} Skyward Systems in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Lumina Solutions relative to Skyward Systems?
SRP.A: Lumina Solutions is {below} Skyward Systems in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total turnover rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Verdant Ventures}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total turnover rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Lumina Solutions}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Verdant Ventures's maximum Turnover Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Verdant Ventures's maximum Turnover Rate is in {2016}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Lumina Solutions's minimum Turnover Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Lumina Solutions's minimum Turnover Rate is in {1999}.

NC.Q: Was the total Turnover Rate in 2003 higher or lower than in 2005?
NC.A: The total turnover rate in 2003 was {lower} than in 2005.

NC.Q: Between 1999 and 2016, was the average total Turnover Rate higher or lower than between 2003 and 2012?
NC.A: The average total turnover rate between 1999 and 2016 was {higher} than between 2003 and 2012.

NC.Q: Between 2000 and 2006, did the total Turnover Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 2003 and 2008?
NC.A: The change in total turnover rate between 2000 and 2006 was {larger} than between 2003 and 2008.

NC.Q: Was the total Turnover Rate in 2001 higher or lower than in 2012?
NC.A: The total turnover rate in 2001 was {lower} than in 2012.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Verdant Ventures} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Skyward Systems and Verdant Ventures first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Skyward Systems and Verdant Ventures first exchanged leading positions in {2000}.
